text: Concetta Mason (born 1952) is an American glass artist. Her work is included in the collections of the Seattle Art Museum, the Metropolitan Museum of Art,https://www.metmuseum.org/art/collection/search/485399 the Cooper Hewitt, Smithsonian Design Museum and the Hunter Museum of American Art. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:20th-century American women artists Category:21st-century American women artists Category:Glass artists Category:Living people
title: Concetta Mason
